variable.name: className
variable.desc: The name of the object class to save

variable.name: learningDirectory
variable.description: The path to the learning set directory

variable.name: testingDirectory
variable.description: The path to the testing set directory

variable.name: validationDirectory
variable.description: The path to the validation set directory

variable.name: output
variable.description: The prefix path to the outputs

variable.name: inferenceFile
variable.description: Use a saved inference as a starting point

variable.name: maxProteinsToLoad
variable.description: Maximum number of learning proteins to load

variable.name: numberOfFolds
variable.description: The number of fold of the training set

variable.name: partAsValidation
variable.description: The part of learning proteins to use as validation proteins.

variable.name: maxIterations
variable.description: The maximum number of iteration per learner

variable.name: learningParameters
variable.description: Numerical learning parameter of each task. You can give a parameter for the Content-Only pass and an other for remaining passes. If no parameter is given for a task and a pass, the default parameter is used (see defaultParameter)

variable.name: defaultParameter
variable.description: The default parameter is used when a learning parameter is not specifed

variable.name: inferenceFile
variable.description: File of the inference to use

variable.name: fastaFile
variable.description: Input FASTA file (comments line must be the CASP PDB file name and the sequence must exactly be the same sequence that the tertiary structure of the CASP PDB file)
